CompOper.Name: AdminCompanyVOCriteria_AdminCompanyVOCriteria_row_0_Active_Oper
CompOper.TransientExpression: "IN (SELECT SP.PARAMETER_VALUE FROM SYS_SYSTEM_PARAMETER SP WHERE SP.PARAMETER_ID='COMPANY_TYPE_SNO' AND SP.GLOBAL_COMPANY_ID=:P_ADF_GLOBAL_COMPANY_CODE)"

CompOper.Name: AdminCompanyVOCriteria_AdminCompanyVOCriteria_row_0_Active_Oper
CompOper.TransientExpression: "IN (SELECT SP.Company_Id FROM GL_COA_USER_COMPANY SP WHERE IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND SP.USER_ID=:P_ADF_USER_ID)"
